name: Doppelbock (2025)
description: Doppelbock is back! 2025 edition of a classic (and probably my favorite beer style)

yeast: 1 yeast cake German Bock Lager Yeast - from Herbstbock 2025

brewing_instructions: Add 6 gallons of water to the kettle and add 1 Campden Tablet
Heat 7 gallons of strike water to 164°F
Add 7 gallons of water to the mash tun
Add all grains to the mash tun and confirm mash temperature of 152°F
Steep grains for 75 minutes
While steeping grains, heat 3 gallons of water for lautering to 170 °F
Fly spage until wort volume of 7.5 gallons is reached
Begin boil and wait for hot break
At 0 minutes, add 7 drops of FermCap to reduce foaming
At 0 minutes, add 1.5 oz Mt. Hood hops
At 65 minutes, add 1.0 oz Mt. Hood hops
At 65 minutes, add 1 tablet Whirlfloc
At 65 minutes, add 0.5 tsp of yeast nutrient
At 75 minutes, chil the wort to 68°F
Aerate wort with pure Oxygen for 1 minute
Move wort to primary fermenter
Pitch yeast
Ferment at 52°F for 7 days
Ferment at 63°F for 4 days (Diacetyl Rest)
Ferment at 52°F for 4 days
Lower temp by -4°F daily to reach 34°F over 7 days
Condition at 34°F for 14 days
Move to keg and carbonate
starter_brewing_instructions: Use yeast cake from previous beer
